summary: Office tool to track daily bank visitors for “MONEY SOLUTION POINT” with automatic timestamping, server-side persistent storage shared across all users/devices, and an Admin mode protected by password "MSP508"; viewing all records, editing, and downloading/exporting are Admin-only actions while visitor entry remains available to non-admin users.
architectural_notes: Admin mode is protected by a single shared password "MSP508" (no admin ID); Admin-only actions include view all records, edit, and download/export.
Visitor records must be persisted server-side in a shared datastore so data is consistent across all users/devices; Admin views should read from the same shared dataset.

existing_features.title: Create a visitor entry flow for “MONEY SOLUTION POINT” to record daily bank visitor details and save each entry as a persistent record.
Automatically add a timestamp to every visitor record at the time it is created, and display the timestamp in the records list.
Add an Admin mode protected by a password login using the exact password value 9533, and restrict export/download actions to Admin mode only.

Implement a coherent, professional office-admin visual theme (colors, typography, spacing, and layout) and apply it consistently across the visitor form, records table, and admin/export views (use English UI labels).

Remove any concept of an “admin ID” and make admin/unlock access available to any user via a single password prompt using the exact password value "9533" (English UI labels). Admin features must remain hidden/disabled until the correct password is entered.
Remove the password-based admin authentication flow so the app no longer prompts for an admin password and no longer calls backend admin authentication.
Make visitor record export (CSV and Excel) available without admin mode gating, and ensure export actions work without any admin login/unlock step.
Clean up admin-mode state handling in the frontend so it does not affect the UI or exports (remove admin sessionStorage state usage and related logout/admin indicators).

Reintroduce an Admin unlock flow using the exact admin password value "MSP508"; any user can enter this password to unlock Admin features (no admin ID and no per-user restriction). All user-facing text must be in English.

Restrict viewing the full visitor records list/table to Admin-only access: non-admin users can still submit new visitor entries, but they must not be able to see the records table or any record details.
Restrict downloading/exporting visitor records (CSV and Excel) to Admin-only access.
Add an Admin-only ability to edit an existing visitor record, and ensure non-admin users cannot edit records.
Ensure the Admin records table and Admin exports always reflect the server-stored shared dataset (no per-device/per-browser local-only storage for visitor records).

new_feature_requests.summary: Create daily bank visitor tracking form to log visitor details for MONEY SOLUTION POINT
Automatically add timestamp to each visitor record
Admin can generate/export visitor data files (CSV, Excel, etc.)
Provide Admin-only export of visitor records to downloadable files in CSV and Excel format.
Reintroduce Admin mode with password "MSP508" (no admin ID); any user can unlock Admin via the single password
Restrict viewing all data, editing records, and downloading/exporting to Admin-only options (after Admin unlock)

Implement backend Admin unlock and authorization checks using the exact password "MSP508" to gate: list records, export records, and edit records; adding a new visitor record must remain open to everyone.
Store visitor records on the server (shared database) so all users accessing the website see the same data; Admin view should reflect the same shared records.

Store visitor records and the next entry ID in stable canister state so data is saved on the server and remains available across canister upgrades/redeploys, and so all users accessing the website contribute to the same shared dataset.
Add conditional state migration support (backend/migration.mo) to safely upgrade existing deployments to the new stable storage format without data loss.
